Reference

All functions

date_to_index()

Convert date-likes to time index

db_assign_dataset()

Assign Time Series Identifiers to a Dataset

db_call_function()

Helper to construct SQL function calls

db_collection_add()

Bundles Keys into an Existing Collection or Adds a New Collection

db_collection_delete()

Remove an Entire Time Series Key Collection

db_collection_remove()

Remove Keys From a User's Collection

db_create_connection()

Create Database Connection

db_create_dataset()

Create a New Dataset

db_get_dataset_id()

Find Datasets Given a Set

db_get_dataset_keys()

Get All Time Series Keys in a Given Set

db_get_metadata_validity()

Get Latest Validity for Metadata of a Given Time Series

db_read_ts_metadata()

Read Time Series Metadata

db_store_ts_metadata()

Store Time Series Metadata to PostgreSQL

db_tmp_read()

Create and populate a temporary table ts_read with desired (ts_key, ts_validity) pairs for joining against timeseries_main and reading.

db_tmp_store()

Populate Temporary ts_updates table with records first properly formatting validity ranges

get_list_depth()

Determine depth of a list

grant_sql_rights()

Grant execute on timeseriesdb functions

index_to_date()

Helper function to convert time series indices of the form 2005.75 to a date representation like 2005-07-01. Does not currently support sub-monthly frequencies.

install_timeseriesdb()

Title

json_to_ts()

Convert JSON Representation of a Time Series into R Time Series Objects

read_time_series()

Read Time Series From PostgreSQL into R

setup_sql_extentions()

Install PostgreSQL Schemas and Extensions

setup_sql_functions()

Install timeseriesdb System Functions

setup_sql_roles()

Create Roles needed for operation of timeseriesdb

setup_sql_tables()

Install timeseriesdb System Tables

setup_sql_triggers()

Install timeseriesdb Triggers

store_time_series()

Store a set of time series to database
